title: Share notes with others
text: With version 2.0.0, you can now share notes with others. You can share notes with others by clicking on the share button in your note when logged in.

title: Command Palette
text: With version 2.0.0, you can now open the command palette by pressing Ctrl + Space.

title: Recent opened workspaces
text: With version 2.0.0, you can now switch between recent opened workspaces.

title: Changed noted actions
text: With version 2.0.0, noted actions now uses the groq api.
